text:
Yes!!
It's amazing that we can actually sell them!

Yeah, if the weather's good,
getting a little wet won't have much impact.

If we let the customers know beforehand that they
might get wet, there shouldn't be any problem...!
It's like an attraction involving water.
I'm really looking forward to it!

By the way,
we have both costumes and water guns as props...

Let's have a test shoot!
I want to do it!
